      public Playground​(int id, java.lang.String n, java.lang.String adrs, int max, java.lang.String o)
      Create a new playground and set it's attributes
      Parameters:
      id - The playground's id
      n - The playground's name
      adrs - The playground's address
      max - The playground's max number of players
      o - The playground's owner's name
